languages.text: "Прекращение жизненных функций единицы Идира Тласс значительно снизило риск возникновения аномалий на борту. Утилизация была оправдана".
"Terminating the life functions of the unit Idira Tlass has significantly reduced the risk of abnormalities on board. The disposal was warranted."
languages.original_text: "Прекращение жизненных функций единицы Идира Тласс значительно снизило риск возникновения аномалий на борту. Утилизация была оправдана".

traits.locale_text: "Terminating the life functions of the unit Idira Tlass has significantly reduced the risk of abnormalities on board. The disposal was warranted."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Terminating the life functions of the unit Idira Tlass has significantly reduced the risk of abnormalities on board. The disposal was warranted."

traits.locale_text: "Terminating the life functions of the unit Idira Tlass has significantly reduced the risk of abnormalities on board. The disposal was warranted."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “终止伊迪拉·特拉斯的生命功能之后，降低船上发生异常的风险显著降低。这样的处置不无道理。”
languages.original_text: "Terminating the life functions of the unit Idira Tlass has significantly reduced the risk of abnormalities on board. The disposal was warranted."

traits.locale_text: “终止伊迪拉·特拉斯的生命功能之后，降低船上发生异常的风险显著降低。这样的处置不无道理。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Mettre fin aux fonctions vitales de l'unité Idira Tlass a réduit de manière significative les risques d'anormalité à bord. Cette élimination était justifiée. »
languages.original_text: "Terminating the life functions of the unit Idira Tlass has significantly reduced the risk of abnormalities on board. The disposal was warranted."

traits.locale_text: « Mettre fin aux fonctions vitales de l'unité Idira Tlass a réduit de manière significative les risques d'anormalité à bord. Cette élimination était justifiée. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Poner fin a las funciones vitales de la unidad Idira Tlass ha reducido significativamente el peligro de anomalías a bordo. Su eliminación estaba justificada».
languages.original_text: "Terminating the life functions of the unit Idira Tlass has significantly reduced the risk of abnormalities on board. The disposal was warranted."

traits.locale_text: «Poner fin a las funciones vitales de la unidad Idira Tlass ha reducido significativamente el peligro de anomalías a bordo. Su eliminación estaba justificada».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「イディラ・タラースユニットの生命機能を停止したことにより、乗組員が異常にが生じる危険を著しく低減できた。処分は当然だ」
languages.original_text: "Terminating the life functions of the unit Idira Tlass has significantly reduced the risk of abnormalities on board. The disposal was warranted."

traits.locale_text: 「イディラ・タラースユニットの生命機能を停止したことにより、乗組員が異常にが生じる危険を著しく低減できた。処分は当然だ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Durch die Terminierung der Lebensfunktionen der Einheit Idira Tlass wurde das Risiko von Abnormalitäten an Bord signifikant reduziert. Die Entsorgung war gerechtfertigt."
languages.original_text: "Terminating the life functions of the unit Idira Tlass has significantly reduced the risk of abnormalities on board. The disposal was warranted."

traits.locale_text: "Durch die Terminierung der Lebensfunktionen der Einheit Idira Tlass wurde das Risiko von Abnormalitäten an Bord signifikant reduziert. Die Entsorgung war gerechtfertigt."

languages.original_text: "Terminating the life functions of the unit Idira Tlass has significantly reduced the risk of abnormalities on board. The disposal was warranted."

languages.text: "İdira Tlass biriminin hayati fonksiyonlarının sonlandırılması, gemideki anormallik görülme riskini önemli ölçüde azalttı. Kendisinin imhası gerekliydi."
languages.original_text: "Terminating the life functions of the unit Idira Tlass has significantly reduced the risk of abnormalities on board. The disposal was warranted."
